headline: DESPATCH HAST CHAMBER 331F 90 PSIG
categories.lvl1: Heating & Cooling > Environmental and Temperature Test Chambers
categories.lvl2: Heating & Cooling  >  Environmental and Temperature Test Chambers > Other Chambers
specstable:
Manufacturer Despatch
Model LPB1-40V
Description HAST Chamber - 331F 90 PSIG
Maximum Temperature 166 ºC (331 ºF, 439 ºK)
Temperature Control
Control Stability ± 0.500 ºC
Heat/Cool Controls
Control Type Programmable
Overtemperature Protection YES
Interface RS 232
Capacity/Volume Box 4.50 cu ft (0.13 cu m)
Chamber Characteristics
Chamber Construction Electropolished 316 Stainless Steel
Chamber Size
Width 22.50 in (57.15 cm)
Depth 24.00 in (60.96 cm)
Accessories

Unit No. 1 Has removable shelf unit: 16"W x 20"D x 12"H-- with two 6"H x 15.75"W compartments. See detailed photos

Unit No. 2. Has card cage with (12) 22 pin card edge connectors. There are a total of 120 teflon coated conductors exiting the chamber. See detailed images. Edge connector P/N: MP-7156-22-DY-5GY-1799

Other Information

Vessel Door Opening: 23.5"
Humidity Range: 60-100%, (limited by 16PSIA vapor pressure)
Humitidy Uniformity: .8% in empty vessel
Average time to temperature
25°C to 130°C - 40 min. (80% RH)
25°C to 166°C - 64 min. (100% RH)



Power Requirements 208 V 35.0 A 60 Hz
Exterior Dimensions
Width 44.000 in (111.8 cm)
Depth 46.000 in (116.8 cm)
Height 86.000 in (218.4 cm)
